title: UNXERIF
content: hello, I am working in this typeface, I need your commentaries please. Also I need to know as they are the variants that create had to include a family for screen. I
author: luciano_vergara

comments.content:
I like it. It has a fun feel to it overall, especially the numerals.   
   
I'd like to see your grays one shade lighter though. They draw my eye away from the letter-forms the way they are now.   
   
They seem to work a little better in the bold, but I'd still try it lighter.
The condensed seems to need a pixel great word spacing, as the glyphs are colliding.
